On the TreeHacks 2023 website, you can find information about Stanford University's premier hackathon where participants can build apps, machines, and communities on the Stanford campus. The website includes details about sponsors, prizes, achievements, judges, judging criteria, and different categories to participate in. You can also learn about specific prizes like electric kick scooters, Mac Minis, Sonos speakers, 3D printers, Apple Watches, and more. Visit www.treehacks.com for more details!
